short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save webpages to list of sites to revisit later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A TODO list of Web pages to follow up later.

Add a webpage to list of pages to re-visit later for following up.

Use it as a temporary bookmark manager to save web pages you want to visit later or follow up, create a TODO list from webpages.
